title: Mannequin Pussy Perform “I Got Heaven” Backed by Nuns on Everybody’s Live with John Mulaney: Watch
description: The electrifying performance marked the Philly punk rockers' television debut. Mannequin Pussy Perform “I Got Heaven” Backed by Nuns on Everybody’s Live with John Mulaney: Watch Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: Mannequin Pussy delivered a fiery performance of "I Got Heaven" on Everybody’s Live with John Mulaney while backed by a choir of "nuns."
text: Mannequin Pussy made their television debut on Wednesday night, performing the title track from their latest album, I Got Heaven, on the third episode of John Mulaney’s new talk show, Everybody’s Live. Watch the replay below. During the electrifying performance, singer Marisa Dabice snarled her way through the song. In a striking contrast to her fiery delivery, a choir of “nuns” provided soothing backup vocals. Get Mannequin Pussy Tickets Here See where I Got Heaven landed on our list of the best albums of 2024, and pick up your copy here. Mannequin Pussy are set to resume touring in support of the album in early April, including festival appearances at Governors Ball, Bonnaroo, and Shaky Knees. See the schedule below, and get tickets here. html:
Mannequin Pussy made their television debut on Wednesday night, performing the title track from their latest album, I Got Heaven, on the third episode of John Mulaney’s new talk show, Everybody’s Live. Watch the replay below.

During the electrifying performance, singer Marisa Dabice snarled her way through the song. In a striking contrast to her fiery delivery, a choir of “nuns” provided soothing backup vocals.

Get Mannequin Pussy Tickets Here

See where I Got Heaven landed on our list of the best albums of 2024, and pick up your copy here.

Mannequin Pussy are set to resume touring in support of the album in early April, including festival appearances at Governors Ball, Bonnaroo, and Shaky Knees. See the schedule below, and get tickets here.

Mannequin Pussy 2025 Tour Dates:
